questions.question: Which two cultures influenced the early development of Islamic geometric design?

choices.answer: Roman and Persian
Persian and Celtic
Roman and Celtic
Greek and Roman

questions.question: Every Islamic geometric pattern begins with a circle. What is the first major decision you take after drawing the first

choices.answer: Into how many equal sections should it be divided
How many other circles of the same diameter to draw
How many stars do you want in your pattern
Will the circles of your pattern be touching or overlapping?

questions.question: Which of the following statements are true? A grid _____.

choices.answer: Helps to make the composition uneven
Only works if you know exactly what you want to make
Is perfect for five fold compositions
Keeps the pattern accurate

questions.question: Why are fivefold patterns more difficult to tessellate than fourfold or sixfold patterns?

choices.answer: Pentagons don't neatly fill a surface
There are no vertical or horizontal lines in a fivefold pattern
Pentagons don't naturally occur in nature
It's impossible to accurately divide a circle into five equal sections

questions.question: What is the most straightforward way to determine into which category a pattern falls?

choices.answer: Counting the 'petals' or rays around a central star
Measuring the angles of a central star
Counting how many stars feature in a composition
Trying to imagine the type of grid that might lie underneath the pattern
